title: What is a Google Phone!?! Reviewing Every Pixel/Nexus Ever!
description: Reviewing every Google phone ever made!  0:00 What is a Google Phone? 1:06 The G1/Dream 3:30 Nexus One 5:35 Nexus S 7:00 Galaxy Nexus 8:40 Nexus 4 9:51 Nexus 5 12:00 Nexus 6 14:33 Nexus 5X 15:03 Nexus 6P 16:04 Google Pixel 18:16 Pixel 2 20:09 Pixel 3 21:30 Pixel 3a 22:44 Pixel 4 24:14 Pixel 4a 26:00 Pixel 5 27:24 Pixel 5A 28:03 Pixel 6 30:33 What is a Google Phone?!
